text: Pros + Young, talented, and ambitious team + Founders are accessible and have a friendly ear for all of their employees, be it interns, working students, or department leads + For a startup in it's early days work is quite well structured and early processes are in place + Habit of regular retrospectives with the entire company and team events + Casual atmosphere with ping pong table and lounge area in the office Cons - Currently there is no remote work possible Advice to Management Keep empowering teams to reach their goals

cons: A young, fast developing company is not the right place for you when you like fixed processes, the same tasks every day and 9to5 working hours (although the working hours here are really really ok)
pros: Working with good set up goals with a lot of freedom and responsibility and getting great support. The company is developing and moving really fast and your opinion and feedback is really appreciated. The whole team is super motivated, engaged, high skilled and amazingly friendly and supportive. Every day is a pleasure even thought a start up surrounding is sometimes not really chilled.
text: Pros Working with good set up goals with a lot of freedom and responsibility and getting great support. The company is developing and moving really fast and your opinion and feedback is really appreciated. The whole team is super motivated, engaged, high skilled and amazingly friendly and supportive. Every day is a pleasure even thought a start up surrounding is sometimes not really chilled. Cons A young, fast developing company is not the right place for you when you like fixed processes, the same tasks every day and 9to5 working hours (although the working hours here are really really ok)
title: Great company with great founders and an amazing team

cons: It's a startup, so sometimes resources can be tight and some processes are lacking, but that's to be expected and not really causing any major problems within the company as it stands
pros: Definitely one of the best jobs I've ever had, due to the following:
text: Pros Definitely one of the best jobs I've ever had, due to the following: - Highly motivated, dedicated team of intelligent individuals - it's awesome getting to work with such talented people every day - Founders are driven and forward-thinking, and are dedicated to building an open and supportive working environment - Interesting product with lots of opportunity for growth - Opportunities to attend training and conferences to further your career Cons It's a startup, so sometimes resources can be tight and some processes are lacking, but that's to be expected and not really causing any major problems within the company as it stands
title: Exciting product and awesome team!

advice: Open up even more development opportunities for employees
cons: As in every start-up everyone is very motivated and working hard. But I enjoy work a lot so it's not a big deal.
pros: HeyJobs is the perfect place to work. Very fast but structured environment. No chaos but still high speed. Careful hiring decisions lead to great team fit. Total transparency on all decisions. Great people to work with and great product that might change the world.
text: Pros HeyJobs is the perfect place to work. Very fast but structured environment. No chaos but still high speed. Careful hiring decisions lead to great team fit. Total transparency on all decisions. Great people to work with and great product that might change the world. Cons As in every start-up everyone is very motivated and working hard. But I enjoy work a lot so it's not a big deal. Advice to Management Open up even more development opportunities for employees
title: Great Company to work for - Start-Up but professional

cons: It's a new Startup but with the support of the founders and the team I am sure we will achieve great things.
pros: Highly skilled, friendly and supportive team, the culture at HeyJobs is really motivating.
text: Pros Highly skilled, friendly and supportive team, the culture at HeyJobs is really motivating. The founders place a strong focus on personal development and growth of employees and empower the team to take on responsibility for projects, which has created a positive, dynamic working environment. Cool product with exciting potential! Cons It's a new Startup but with the support of the founders and the team I am sure we will achieve great things.
title: Really cool place to work!

cons: Einzig negativer Punkt ist die Start-Up typische fluktuation
pros: Interessantes Start-Up mit großem Potential. Persönliche Entwicklung wird unterstützt. Habe bisher noch keine bessere Arbeitsatmosphäre erlebt und das Verhalten unter den Mitarbeitern ist sehr kollegial. Wer Lust auf spannende Tasks und ein dynamisches Umfeld hat ist hier richtig.
text: Pros Interessantes Start-Up mit großem Potential. Persönliche Entwicklung wird unterstützt. Habe bisher noch keine bessere Arbeitsatmosphäre erlebt und das Verhalten unter den Mitarbeitern ist sehr kollegial. Wer Lust auf spannende Tasks und ein dynamisches Umfeld hat ist hier richtig. title: Spannende Tasks und angenehme Arbeitsatmosphäre

cons: Young company and management, things change a lot.
pros: Very friendly people, everyone is relaxed and helpful. No screaming or shouting, everyone is super professional. You feel appreciated and respected, a lot of room to develop yourself.
